_header: Farewell my friends the tide abideth no man
Note:
Forms the last stanza of 1271; see also 2959, 5047; Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 765
Bibliographic Ghosts:
olim
olim Maldon, Essex, Church of All Saints brass tomb: see 1271; Higham Ferrars, Northamptonshire, Church of St. Mary the Virgin tomb of William and Beatrice Chichele on floor at west end of south aisle, to right of Lady Chapel altar: see 5047
_description: An epitaph, frequently inscribed on monuments or brasses — one stanza rhyme royal
